title: Agriculture Technology Revolutionizes The Way We Raise Cattle!

tasks.task: Managing large cattle herds via helicopter mustering.
subtasks: Coordinating between the helicopter pilot and ground crew.
Driving an immense herd of cattle to a designated gathering point using aerial maneuvering.
Monitoring cattle across challenging terrains (hills, forests, wetlands) from above.
Using GPS technology for precise tracking and guidance of cattle.
Detecting early signs of cattle disease for timely veterinary care.
Transporting cattle between grazing areas safely via helicopter.
Conducting thorough helicopter inspections before and after flights for safety.

tasks.task: Using helicopters for cattle rescue operations.
subtasks: Aerially rescuing cattle trapped in hard-to-reach areas using nets and cables.
Observing herds from an aerial perspective to locate trapped or injured cattle.

tasks.task: Utilizing drone technology in cattle herding.
subtasks: Directing cattle movement using drones equipped with high-resolution cameras.
Monitoring crops and pastures with drones for pest and water management.

tasks.task: Implementing modern livestock farming techniques in Central Asia.
subtasks: Monitoring cattle health and productivity using sensor systems and software.
Optimizing feedlot methods with temperature control barns and nutritious feed.
Developing hybrid cattle breeds for higher meat yields and quality.

tasks.task: Trading and processing livestock in Central Asia.
subtasks: Evaluating the health of calves during market transactions.
Collecting and bottle-feeding milk from mothers to calves.
Harvesting and storing hay for winter feed.
Sheltering cattle from harsh winter weather.
Ensuring hygiene in milking practices, especially on large farms.
Marketing organic and antibiotic-free beef to meet international demand.

tasks.task: Ensuring the safety of pilots during cattle mustering.
subtasks: Flying at appropriate altitudes and speeds to avoid wildlife and terrain hazards.
Avoiding areas with strong winds to prevent accidents.
